title: Zoe Kravitz was told she was too 'urban' to be in a Batman film
text:
Zoe in The Dark Knight Rises is what we deserved (Picture: Getty, Warner Bros)

Long before the amazing Zoe Kravitz was cast as Catwoman, she was told she was too ‘urban’ for a role in a Batman movie.

The star tried to get an audition for Christopher Nolan’s 2012 film The Dark Knight Rises, which starred Christian Bale as Batman and Tom Hardy as Bane.

She told Nylon Magazine in 2015: ‘In the last Batman movie [The Dark Knight Rises], they told me that I couldn’t get an audition for a small role they were casting because they weren’t “going urban”.

‘It was like, “What does that have to do with anything?” I have to play the role like, “Yo, what’s up, Batman? What’s going on wit chu?”’

Yeah, you read that right.

Apparently sometime between 2010 and now, Warner Bros. realised that Zoe is worthy of whatever role she wants.

On Monday, it was announced she is set to star as Selina Kyle aka Catwoman in the upcoming film The Batman alongside Robert Pattinson, who plays a young Bruce Wayne.

We’re so ready for the coolest Catwoman yet (Picture: KCS Presse / MEGA)

The movie will focus on Bruce Wayne’s transformation into the rich and troubled Caped Crusader.

Director Matt Reeves teased that his idea for the trilogy is ‘very much a point of view-driven, noir Batman tale.’

‘It’s told very squarely on his shoulders, and I hope it’s going to be a story that will be thrilling but also emotional,’ he added. ‘It’s more Batman in his detective mode than we’ve seen in the films.’

Zoe – who is the daughter of Lenny Kravitz and Lisa Bonet – was congratulated by friends and family for her role.

Stepdad Jason Momoa told her: ‘I’m so proud of u zozo bear. On and off screen OHANA. DC WB ohana Lola and Wolfies big sister is CAT WOMAN.

‘Unbelievable so freaking stoke. Your going to have so much fun Aloha P bear [sic].’

Zoe will be playing alongside Robert Pattinson (Picture: Andrew Toth/Getty Images for Entertainment Weekly)

Imagine being Catwoman, while having a rock star, the world’s most elegant mum, and Aquaman/Khal Drogo as your step dad.
